channel.title: CVE Feed for LOOS,Inc. -- Arkhe Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LOOS,Inc. -- Arkhe Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-38675|2024-08-02T04:12:25.987Z -- loos%2Cinc. -- arkhe%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LOOS,Inc. Arkhe Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Arkhe Blocks: from n/a through 2.22.1.
